title: Power - resistors R0 and 2R0 in parallel

content.question: Two resistors and a battery are connected in a circuit, as shown in the figure. The resistors have resistances of <math alttext="R sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> and <math alttext="2 R sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>, as indicated, and the battery has <math alttext="e m f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mtext>emf</mtext></mstyle></math> <math alttext="open E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>Ɛ</mi></math>. How much power is dissipated by the resistor of resistance <math alttext="2 R sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator open E squared, and denominator 3 R sub 0, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><msup><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mn>3</mn><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator open E squared, and denominator 2 R sub 0, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><msup><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator open E squared, and denominator R sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><msup><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 3 open E squared, and denominator 2 R sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator open E squared, and denominator 2 R sub 0, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><msup><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
